Summary Note:
The RM has known Gutiérrez Morales Vázquez since childhood, as their families have been close friends for many years. This long-standing relationship has fostered a deep trust and understanding between them.
With a career spanning nearly 44 years, Gutiérrez Morales Vázquez has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Gutiérrez Morales Vázquez has been happily married to Elena since 1984. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Gutiérrez earned his secondary school diploma from Instituto de Bachillerato Científico-Técnico IES Juan Sebastián Elcano Bilbao in 1976.
Gutiérrez pursued higher education at Pompeu Fabra University, graduating in 1982.
Occupation History:
Gutiérrez Morales Vázquez is a 67 year old retired CEO from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
At Enagás S.A., Gutiérrez Morales Vázquez held the position of Drilling Engineer from 1981 to 1984, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Enagás S.A. as a Reservoir Engineer, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 1984 to 1985.
He spent 3 years working as a Operations Manager at Enagás S.A., refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He appointment as a VP of Exploration at Repsol S.A. in 1989 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
He held the position of CEO at Gas Natural Fenosa S.A. from 1992 until his retirement.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1670000 EUR.
He owns house in Zaragoza, where he resides. It is worth 1311000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns house in Toledo worth 1497000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Zaragoza, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The condo is valued at 1000000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
